description: For some halo analysis I am doing, this set of early termination fixes sped up in-memory particle selection by 2x.
title: Micro-optimizations for 2x speedup in sphere selection.

pullrequest.title: Micro-optimizations for 2x speedup in sphere selection.

content.raw: I am getting Cython compile errors with these changes.  Is there a required Cython version for this?  I seem to be on Cython 0.19.1.

content.raw: I am seeing differences in the number of cells contained within spheres that are on domain boundaries.  I wonder if there might be a problem with periodicity.
content.html: I am seeing differences in the number of cells contained within spheres that are on domain boundaries. I wonder if there might be a problem with periodicity.

pullrequest.title: Micro-optimizations for 2x speedup in sphere selection.

content.raw:
Indeed, periodicity is no longer being honored.

For this script: http://paste.yt-project.org/show/4614/

This PR:

pullrequest.title: Micro-optimizations for 2x speedup in sphere selection.

content.raw:
Great catch. There almost certainly is. Thank you! Let's leave this open
for now and if it's salvageable I will, and if not, I'll just add tests and
revert the changes.
content.html: Great catch. There almost certainly is. Thank you! Let's leave this open for now and if it's salvageable I will, and if not, I'll just add tests and revert the changes.

pullrequest.title: Micro-optimizations for 2x speedup in sphere selection.

content.raw:
Okay. I will not use the early termination for any sphere that overflows
the domain. Next update... :)
content.html: Okay. I will not use the early termination for any sphere that overflows the domain. Next update... :)
